choices: At school
At home
At Cliviea's work
At a restoraunt
Somewhere else
1.content: Where does the story start
1.title: The beginning

choices: Clea messes with Tobias
Tobias reveals a secret of his
Cliviea returns home
Clea makes a bet
Tobias has some fun
12.content:
Things were relatively quite at the Cracked household but things were going to change. Tobias was like nearly any other boy his age in high school but there was annoyance he has in life, his twin sister Clea. He was a bit below the average weight for a boy his age while his sister was on the fatter side. Clea weighed in at a hefty 250 pounds compared to his 110 pounds. But that was near nothing compared to their 500 pound mother. There were two things Clea loves to do, eat and tease Tobias. They have an older bother named Clint but the only time they spend time with him now was when he manages to slip away from their mother and her insatiable hunger.

"There you are bones. Why don't you fatten up a bit and you could get a wonderful girl like me." Clea said.

"Why would I want to date a glutton or be one?" Tobias said.

"Mad because I'm beautiful at this size?"

Tobias tried ignoring her for he knew her antics. It was true that Clea was the most beautiful girl in school at her size but that doesn't change his opinion about fattening himself up. There wasn't a single blemish on Clea's body and she liked it. Boys adored her and girls ignored Tobias with the exception of those who were terrified of Clea. In the end, he was still single dealing with the crap that Clea brings him.
12.title: At home

choices: Tobias takes more barbecue ribs and mashed potatoes.
Tobias just sits there and watches everyone continue to eat.
123.content:
After Tobias was being teased, Cliviea returns home from work. It's dinner time and everyone including Clint will come over for this dinner. It's barbecue ribs, mashed potatoes with gravy, green beans and a cherry pie with vanilla ice-cream for dessert.

"Tobias, I hope that you eat a lot of this! It's delicious!" shouted Clea while placing out the paper plates and forks for everyone.

"I'll eat some of course, barbecue ribs and mashed potatoes are my favorite anyway Clea," said Tobias while choosing his seat to sit down at.

"Well, we'll see how many of the ribs you eat. You really should gain some weight!" said Clea.

"That's enough for now Clea, let's eat everyone!" said Cliviea hungrily.

         Everyone sat down at their place at the table and everyone but Tobias greedily grabbed what they wanted to put on to their plate. Tobias only grabbed four ribs and two spoonful's of mashed potatoes. He doesn't like green beans so he left them on the table.

"Tobias, I knew you were hardly going to eat anything! This is why you're so skinny! What the heck Tobias?!" shouted Clea.

"That's enough Clea, let's continue to eat now instead," said Clint who sometimes sticks up for Tobias.
123.title: Cliviea returns home

choices: Tobias goes to his room.
Tobias helps Clea clean up the kitchen.
1232.content:
Tobias chooses to sit there and wait for everyone to finish eating. He was saving room for dessert. He knew that this was ticking Clea off but he didn't care at this point, that's how she always is toward him anyway, even if he were to get more she'd still be on his case. All of the barbecue ribs and mashed potatoes are now gone, and a little bit of green beans were left.

"Well everyone, anyone up for dessert?" asked Cliviea hungrily.

"Yes!" said Clint holding his plate out for some pie and ice-cream.

"Include me in on this too!" said Clea doing the same thing Clint is.

"Me too, just a little piece of the pie now, and no ice-cream," said Tobias.

"All Tobias, the ice-cream won't make you gain weight! Have some!" shouted Clea.

"That's enough Clea. Here you go everyone!" said Cliviea handing out the pie and ice-cream to everyone.

"Thanks Ma," said Tobias.

         Everyone had a second or third large piece of pie and ate all of it and the ice-cream. Tobias just sat there watching them scarf everything down after he finished eating his small piece of pie. Since Tobias was always first to finish eating, Cliviea made Clea do the clean up. Sometimes Tobias helps her and sometimes he just goes to his room so he doesn't have to keep hearing her harass him about not eating like the rest of them did.
1232.title: Tobias just sits there and watches everyone con...

choices: In the morning on the bus, Tobias decides to join the band.
In the morning on the bus, Tobias tells Clea he'll join basketball.
12322.content:
"Tobias, why didn't you eat more? I heard your stomach was still growling. I'm not harassing you I just don't understand why you just don't eat a little more," said Clea a little concerned.

"I just don't feel like eating a little more. I think my weigh is fine," said Tobias.

"Well, you should gain just a little more. Anyway, I bet you can't get a date by Friday this week. I got one for Monday and Friday night. Monday it will be with Jake and Friday will be Phil," said Clea boastingly.

"I'm happy for you Clea," said Tobias a little on the jealous side anyway.

"Well, why not join a sport such as basketball? You'll meet a girl that way if anything. Or join the band! That's an even better idea!" said Clea confidently.

"I'll think about this tonight and on the bus I'll let you know what I decide," said Tobias not too thrilled knowing that he should consider Clea's advice and having to choose something to do just to have more of a chance to meet a girl.

         Tobias went to his room afterward and thought about what he should choose to do. Since he didn't weigh much, he thought that maybe it wouldn't be such a great idea to join a sport, especially one such as football. He thought that joining basketball would be alright, but then he thought about being in the band instead...
12322.title: Tobias helps Clea clean up the kitchen.

choices: Tobias decides to not go through with doing basketball.
Tobias decides to give basketball a try and plays the game on this Friday.
123222.content:
"Clea, I decided to join the basketball team," said Tobias.

"That's wonderful! Wait until I tell all of my friends this!" said Clea.

"I'll tell the coach today during gym," said Tobias.

"Good, do that," said Clea.

         Tobias sat during study hall wondering if he made the right choice or not. He hardly knew anything about basketball. He thought to at least give it a try though to meet a girl.

"Coach, I'd like to join the basketball team," said Tobias.

"That's great news! The next game is on this Friday," said coach Harvey.

"Thanks coach!" said Tobias.

         All week Tobias trained for the game hard. The other boys noticed that he didn't know some of the common moves nor did he know what a free throw was. Tobias was feeling a little bit embarrassed and was wondering if he shouldn't go through with this and join the band instead. He already at least knows how to play a trumpet since he was in Junior High.
123222.title: In the morning on the bus, Tobias tells Clea he...

choices: Tobias decides to still try being on the basketball team.
Tobias decides to leave the basketball team and join the band instead.
1232222.content:
"I can hardly believe I joined basketball. I'm going to give it a try at least," said Tobias wondering if he should've chose to join the band instead.

"Hey Tobias! You're on the team! That's great!" said Barry the head team member of the Falcon basketball team.

"Yes! I'm glad I'm here!" said Tobias happily.

"Well, welcome aboard! Let's see how you do now. We're going now," said Barry.

"I'm sure I'll do just fine," said Tobias hoping he'll do well on the team for them.

         Tobias is nervous. He's also shy, especially whenever there's a crowd. He just picks his head up and focus's on the game though and hopes for the best. The other team, the Hawks from the other town are in the lead, it's 9-6. Tobias attempts to make a basket a few times but never succeeds.

"That was a great game even though we lost by one point," said Barry to Tobias.

"Yes but I didn't make any baskets," said Tobias disappointedly.

"That's alright! You played well anyway," said Barry.

"Thanks," said Tobias still disappointed in himself.
1232222.title: Tobias decides to give basketball a try and pla...

info.brief_description: Tobias Cracked has a huge problem. Namely his domineering mother. Cliviea Cracked
info.description:
Characters: Tobias Cracked 16 year old high school student who weighs 110 pounds

Cliviea Cracked single mother of 4 who has an insatiable appetite weighs 500 pounds

Clint Cracked, Tobias' older brother age 25. Is the only one who can keep Cliviea satisfied weighs 195 pounds

Clea Cracked twin sister to Tobias loves to tease Tobias. Weighs 250 pounds
